idea:
I would like to take this opportunity to introduce my company profile. We are at “Creative Graphics” into the printing & packaging business catering for all kind of paper base printing for our corporate clients in various industry like FMCG/ Pharma and others. 
Please find attached company profile for your reference.  
Below are the few details regarding our set up: 
To provide top most quality and meet the delivery timeline of clients, We have our own set up with below mention machines.  
 Heidelberg  offset ( Capacity of min.8000 prints/ hour ) 
 Paper cutting machine 
 Paper die machine 
Currently we are working with few FMCG and Pharma client like Johnson & Johnson, Sky Chef Ambesedoor. Also with some bank sector organisations.
Thanks
name: Creative Graphics

idea: We are training women from Self Help Groups from Grass root level for manufacturing and sales and marketing of low cost quality sanitary pads for the rural market. This skill development activity is being done to prepare the trainees for self employment and entrepreneurship in the sanitary pad space and provide affordable yet quality products to the rural consumers who cannot afford MNC products. This initiative is being carried out in co-ordination with MSSDS (Maharashtra State Skill Development Society)
name: Suman Industries Pvt Ltd

idea: Drchef is nutritious healthy food based startup which will serve children in the age group of 6-15 years.
name: DrChef Nutritions Private Limited

idea: Active Directory serves as a centralized data store for quick access to all  users, and controls access for users based on the security policies set in place. This service provides  a common interface for organizing and maintaining information related to resources connected to a variety of network directories. Active Directory is also designed especially for distributed networking environments. The directories may be systems-based (like Windows OS), application specific or network resources, like printers. Essentially, it saves a lot of time and prevents human  error with regards to permissions and security.
name: EQUUSSOL

idea: NanoSniff Technologies is a MicroSensors & Instrumentation StartUp that was incubated at at Indian Institute of Technology Bombay. Nanosniff works in the area of developing Nanotechnology based products to address the problems of the Security & the Healthcare Diagnostics Sector. NanoSniff is the first Indian company that has successfully commercialize MEMS Microcantilever and Microheater bases Sensor technologies.
name: Nanosniff Technologies Pvt Ltd

idea:

We offer Enterprise , SaaS and Mobility Products for Industry 4.0 – IIOT, Machine Learning & Analytics to Drive sustainable Benefits
We have Client base of India’s Top Manufacturers spread across Discrete & Process Industries comprising of Automotive, FMCG, Textile, Capital Goods etc.
Led by experienced Cofounders having 20 +Years of experience.
Vision to be a leader in Digital Manufacturing space with best in class SaaS, Enterprise & PaaS Products
Invest and excel in Machine Learning, AI, Prescriptive and Predictive Analytics
Become the knowledge warehouse on Machines/Practices/Processes
Customer ROI of less than 3 Months
name: CLAIRVIZ TECHNOLOGY SYSTEMS PRIVATE LIMITED
